lead_paragraph: Saints coach Sean Payton smiled often and answered questions for a full hour while Saints owner Tom Benson and general manager Mickey Loomis looked on from a few feet away.

headline.print_headline: Payton Says He'll Remain Saints Coach
headline.main: Payton Says He'll Remain Saints Coach

snippet: Saints coach Sean Payton smiled often and answered questions for a full hour while Saints owner Tom Benson and general manager Mickey Loomis looked on from a few feet away....
